nodes.text: If the Headgear Fits was an Imperial propaganda poster created by Coba Dunivee. It depicted a black and red background with the Imperial Crest on the top left corner, as well as six heads facing to the right, three for each row, with the top row having one head wearing the command cap of an Imperial officer, a standard Stormtrooper helmet, and a TIE fighter pilot helmet, and the bottom row having an Imperial combat driver helmet, a Scout trooper helmet, and a Cold weather assault stormtrooper helmet. The top of the poster had in High Galactic font "If the headgear fits", and the bottom of the poster has in a similar font "Wear it!!!" followed by the message "Join the Empire."
This poster was first released on StarWars.com as part of an online promotional campaign for the Star Wars Rebels animated series in February 2014.
